com.thomasdiewald.liquidfun.java.render

Class DwBodyGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomasdiewald.liquidfun.java.render.DwBodyGroup

  • public class DwBodyGroup
extends Object
    Hierarchical PShape SceneGraph, built from all Box2D-World Body/Fixture shapes.
    Author:
    Thomas Diewald
